2.text: Take over-the-counter drugs such as acetaminophen or ibuprofen.
2.vid: /6/67/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Take a hot shower or bath.
3.vid: /1/10/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.vid: /7/79/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Use a heating pad on your sore spots.
5.vid: /2/23/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Apply an ice pack to the impacted area.
6.vid: /e/e8/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Apply a balm to the sore neck.
7.vid: /f/fe/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Support your neck with a brace if the pain is severe.
8.vid: /d/d8/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Try to massage the painful areas.
9.vid: /a/a4/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.vid: /7/73/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4

11.text: Ensure your workstation is ergonomically correct.
11.vid: /7/74/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.vid: /b/bf/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 12 Version 2.360p.mp4

13.text: Remove physical and emotional stressors from your life.
13.vid: /7/72/Get Rid of a Sore Neck Step 13 Version 2.360p.mp4
